images.description: Radar waves icon showing concentric circles emanating from a center point, representing millimeter wave radar technology. Use orange gradient colors (#D97A34 to #F4A460). Show 3-4 concentric wave rings with a solid center dot.
Heart monitoring icon with a stylized heart shape and EKG/heartbeat line overlay. Use green gradient colors (#2D5B3E to #4A7C59) for the heart and orange (#D97A34) for the EKG line.
Privacy shield icon representing data protection and security. Use green colors for trust and security. Simple shield shape with lock or checkmark symbol.
Zen circle (enso) icon - a traditional Japanese calligraphy circle representing enlightenment and mindfulness. Simple brushstroke circle, not perfectly closed.
Lotus flower icon representing spiritual growth and enlightenment. Simple, stylized lotus with layered petals.
Dove icon representing peace and spiritual freedom. Simple, graceful dove silhouette, possibly in flight.
Om (AUM) symbol icon - the sacred sound and spiritual symbol in Hinduism and Buddhism. Traditional Om script symbol.
Real-time monitoring icon showing clock/timer with data flow arrows or waves, representing live monitoring capability.
Analytics icon with bar charts, graphs, or data visualization elements representing data analysis and insights.

Technology diagram showing ZenMirror's millimeter wave radar system. Show device → radar waves → signal processing → real-time analysis → feedback loop. Use ZenMirror color scheme (greens and oranges).
Scientific chart showing HRV (Heart Rate Variability) and RSA (Respiratory Sinus Arrhythmia) data visualization. Show waveforms, data points, and medical/scientific styling.
Closed-loop system diagram showing meditation feedback cycle: sensing → analysis → guidance → improved meditation → sensing. Circular flow with arrows.
HRV research icon showing heart rate variability concept with scientific elements like graphs, heart symbol, and research indicators.
Meditation research icon combining meditation pose silhouette with scientific elements like brain waves or research symbols.
images.style: research icon, combining spirituality and science

images.description: RSA (Respiratory Sinus Arrhythmia) research icon showing breathing patterns, heart rhythm, and scientific research elements.
ZenMirror device setup view showing the device positioned for meditation monitoring. Clean, modern setup in a meditation space with the device on a stand or table.
